jokes.question: Why does Virat Kohli love rainy days?
jokes.answer: Because he gets to show off his cover drive!

jokes.question: Why did Rohit Sharma become a chef?
jokes.answer: He's great at cooking up big scores!

jokes.question: Why does Jasprit Bumrah make a great detective?
jokes.answer: He's always on the hunt for the perfect line and length!

jokes.question: What's Shikhar Dhawan's favorite dance move?
Why did Hardik Pandya start a moving company?
jokes.answer: Because he's an all-rounder who can handle any shift!
